hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT count(o) FROM Apartment o inner join o.building b left join b.buildingses bs WHERE o.status=0 and bs.id=?

select distinct o FROM Apartment o inner join fetch o.building b left join b.buildingses bs LEFT JOIN FETCH o.apartmentNumbers n WHERE o.status=0 and bs.id=? and n.begin <= current_date() and current_date() <= n.end order by n.value
SELECT count(o) FROM Apartment o inner join o.building b WHERE o.status=0 and b.id=?
select distinct o from Apartment o inner join fetch o.building b left join fetch o.apartmentNumbers n where o.status=0 and b.id=?
SELECT DISTINCT a FROM Apartment a LEFT JOIN FETCH a.apartmentNumbers WHERE a.id=?
FROM Apartment a LEFT JOIN FETCH a.apartmentNumbers WHERE a.building.id=? AND EXISTS (FROM ApartmentNumber n WHERE n.apartment.id=a.id AND n.value=? and n.end>? )

SELECT DISTINCT a FROM Apartment a inner join fetch a.building LEFT JOIN FETCH a.apartmentNumbers LEFT JOIN FETCH a.personRegistrations r LEFT JOIN FETCH r.person p LEFT JOIN FETCH p.personAttributes pa LEFT JOIN FETCH pa.lang pal LEFT JOIN FETCH pal.translations tr LEFT JOIN FETCH p.personIdentities pi LEFT JOIN FETCH pi.identityType it LEFT JOIN FETCH it.translations ittr LEFT JOIN FETCH ittr.lang lang LEFT JOIN FETCH lang.translations WHERE a.id=?
